metadata.title: CVE-2019-9186 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In several JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA versions, a Spring Boot runconfiguration with the default setting allowed remote attackers to executecode when the configuration is running, because a JMX server listens on allinterfaces (instead of listening on only the localhost interface). Thisissue has been fixed in the following versions: 2019.1, 2018.3.4, 2018.2.8,2018.1.8, and 2017.3.7.

criterions.comment: intellij-community-idea package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
